description: Custom designed for your precious Google Nexus 7 Android Tablet, this MoKo case features a combination of functionality and style.Premium quality PU leather boosts a classy look;No-scratch microfiber interior adds comfort and an additional layer of protection;Automatically wakes or puts your device to sleep when the lid is opened and closed.Access to all controls and features;Folding cover transforms the case to be a stand with two angles: perfect whenever you type an email or watch a movie.Well built to protect your Google Nexus 7 Android Tablet for the years to come.This product is sold exclusively by BSCstore. Only buy from BSCstore to get genuine MoKo(TM) products with Lifetime warranty and superb customer service.
title: MoKo Slim Cover Case with Stand for Google Nexus 7 Android Tablet by Asus, Black
